channel.title: RefactorFirst
channel.description: Articles about everything related to smart home. Here we explore what are the various ways we can integrated smart devices to Home Assistant and much more.

item.title: Spring Boot 3 Docker Compose Support
item.description: We will have a look at the new Spring Boot 3.1 feature supporting Docker Compose files on startup. No need to start Docker compose separately again
item.author: (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Spring Cloud AWS 3.0 S3 with Spring Boot and Localstack
item.description: In this article, we will look into how we can use Spring Cloud AWS S3 in a Spring Boot Application to communicate with AWS. We will run our setup with LocalStack to mock the actual AWS S3 service
item.author: (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Distributed Tracing With OpenTelemetry and Jaeger In Spring Boot 3
item.description: In this article, we will look at how we can export distributed traces using Opentelemetry to Jaeger from a Spring Boot Application
item.author: (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Spring Boot With MongoDB Using Spring Data
item.description: In this article, we will look at how we can start a local MongoDB instance using Docker and then communicate with it using a Spring Boot Application
item.author: (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Kick Start Spring Boot On AWS Lambda with Snap Start
item.description: We will look into how we can create an AWS Lambda with Terraform and run a Spring Boot application to view its performance with the Snap Start option enabled
item.author: (Amrut Prabhu)
